    • 构造器详细资料

      • SensitiveWordClient

        public SensitiveWordClient(java.lang.String appKey,
                   java.lang.String masterSecret)

      • SensitiveWordClient

        public SensitiveWordClient(java.lang.String appkey,
                   java.lang.String masterSecret,
                   HttpProxy proxy,
                   JMessageConfig config)
        Create a JMessage Base Client
        参数:
        appkey - The KEY of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.
        proxy - The proxy, if there is no proxy, should be null.
        config - The client configuration. Can use JMessageConfig.getInstance() as default.

      • updateSensitiveWordStatus

        public ResponseWrapper updateSensitiveWordStatus(int status)
                                          throws APIConnectionException,
                                                 APIRequestException
        Update sensitive word status
        参数:
        status - 1 represent turn on filtering, 0 represent turn off.
        返回:
        No content
        抛出:
        APIConnectionException - connect exception
        APIRequestException - request exception
